title: Advanced Search
description: Manoj does not think twice before sacrificing his love for his grand ambition. He leaves Kavya behind and goes on his search for better career and more money.On his journey, he meets different people and different challenges, which he handles bravely and, sometimes, ruthlessly. Does he reach the height he craves for? Does he get back Kavya? Do the ruthless games he plays give him what he wants?
author: Sami Ahmed
